verses.verse: לְ֭כוּ <WH1980> Le-chu come נְרַנְּנָ֣ה <WH7442> ne-ran-ne-Nah let us sing לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD נָ֝רִ֗יעָה <WH7321> na-Ri-'ah, let us make a joyful noise לְצ֣וּר <WH6697> le-Tzur to the rock יִשְׁעֵֽנוּ׃ <WH3468> yish-'E-nu. of our salvation

נְקַדְּמָ֣ה <WH6923> ne-kad-de-Mah Let us come פָנָ֣יו <WH6440> fa-Nav before his presence בְּתוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> be-to-Dah; with thanksgiving בִּ֝זְמִר֗וֹת <WH2158> biz-mi-Rot, unto him with psalms נָרִ֥יעַֽ <WH7321> na-Ri-a' and make a joyful noise לֽוֹ׃ lo.

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for אֵ֣ל <WH410> 'el God גָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol [is] a great יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; For the LORD וּמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> u-Me-lech King גָּ֝ד֗וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol, and a great עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. above all gods

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whose בְּ֭יָדוֹ <WH3027> be-ya-do In his hand מֶחְקְרֵי־ <WH4278> mech-ke-rei- [are] the deep places אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz; of the earth וְתוֹעֲפ֖וֹת <WH8443> ve-to-'a-Fot the strength הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> ha-Rim of the hills לֽוֹ׃ lo.

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after ל֣וֹ lo הַ֭יָּם <WH3220> Hai-yom The sea וְה֣וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu who עָשָׂ֑הוּ <WH6213> 'a-Sa-hu; [is] his and he made וְ֝יַבֶּ֗שֶׁת <WH3006> ve-yab-Be-shet, the dry יָדָ֥יו <WH3027> ya-Dav it and his hands יָצָֽרוּ׃ <WH3335> ya-Tza-ru. formed

בֹּ֭אוּ <WH935> Bo-'u O come נִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֣ה <WH7812> nish-ta-cha-Veh let us worship וְנִכְרָ֑עָה <WH3766> ve-nich-Ra-'ah; and bow down נִ֝בְרְכָ֗ה <WH1288> niv-re-Chah, let us kneel לִֽפְנֵי־ <WH6440> lif-nei- before יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD עֹשֵֽׂנוּ׃ <WH6213> 'o-Se-nu. our maker

כִּ֘י <WH3588> ki for ה֤וּא <WH1931> hu He אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, For he [is] our God וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ <WH587> va-'a-Nach-nu we עַ֣ם <WH5971> 'am and we [are] the people מַ֭רְעִיתוֹ <WH4830> mar-'i-to of his pasture וְצֹ֣אן <WH6629> ve-Tzon and the sheep יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do; of his hand הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom, To day אִֽם־ <WH518> 'im- if בְּקֹל֥וֹ <WH6963> be-ko-Lo his voice תִשְׁמָֽעוּ׃ <WH8085> tish-Ma-'u. if ye will hear

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תַּקְשׁ֣וּ <WH7185> tak-Shu Harden לְ֭בַבְכֶם <WH3824> Le-vav-chem not your heart כִּמְרִיבָ֑ה <WH4808> kim-ri-Vah; as in the provocation כְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> ke-Yom [and] as [in] the day מַ֝סָּ֗ה <WH4531> mas-Sah, of temptation בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar. in the wilderness

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher When נִ֭סּוּנִי <WH5254> Nis-su-ni tempted אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> a-vo-tei-Chem; When your fathers בְּ֝חָנ֗וּנִי <WH974> be-cha-Nu-ni, me proved גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- though רָא֥וּ <WH7200> ra-'U me and saw פָעֳלִֽי׃ <WH6467> fo-'o-Li. my work

אַרְבָּ֘עִ֤ים <WH705> 'ar-Ba-'Im Forty שָׁנָ֨ה׀ <WH8141> sha-Nah years אָ֘ק֤וּט <WH6962> 'a-Kut long was I grieved בְּד֗וֹר <WH1755> be-Dor, with [this] generation וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar, and said עַ֤ם <WH5971> 'am It [is] a people תֹּעֵ֣י <WH8582> to-'Ei that do err לֵבָ֣ב <WH3824> le-Vav in their heart הֵ֑ם <WH1992> Hem; like וְ֝הֵ֗ם <WH1992> ve-Hem, like לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not יָדְע֥וּ <WH3045> ya-de-'U and they have not known דְרָכָֽי׃ <WH1870> de-ra-Chai. my ways

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- Therefore נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <WH7650> nish-Ba'-ti Unto whom I sware בְאַפִּ֑י <WH639> ve-'ap-Pi; in my wrath אִם־ <WH518> 'im- Truly יְ֝בֹא֗וּן <WH935> ye-vo-'Un, that they should not enter אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into מְנוּחָתִֽי׃ <WH4496> me-nu-cha-Ti. into my rest
